features: [BRILLIANT SOUND WITH RGB COLORFUL LIGHT]: SOWO speaker Bluetooth wireless based on advanced DSP technology, surgeboom 2 is equipped with 25w stereo audio drivers and two wide bass passive radiators, which perfectly achieves stereo sound effect and high volume output. The radiator is also loaded with cool LED lights with dual 256-level brightness display.

[BASSBOOM BASS AND WIRELESS STEREO SURROUND SOUND]: The BASSBOOM technology designed by SOWO portable Bluetooth speaker improves the bass by 28% on the original basis, enhancing stronger auditory enjoyment.The wireless speaker with bluetooth supports TWS function, you can purchase two speakers at the same time to truly enjoy the stereo surround sound of a movie theater by pairing the TWS function.

[16H POWERFUL BATTERY]: SOWO Bluetooth speaker portable wireless built with a high power capacity super electric vehicle battery, can be recharged more than 1000 times, and the maximum actual capacity will not be reduced. Compared to the 300 times rechargeable battery of ordinary speakers, the working life is 3-4 times, and has twice the voltage to provide stronger power. Let's enjoy music day to night.

[IP67 WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF]: Durable fabric and streamlined cylinder designed by injection molding the entire machine structure, which fits the palm very well. Waterproof Bluetooth speaker is lightweight and portable size,you can put it in your backpack or attach it to your bike, or even hang it anywhere with the well-knit lanyard. It is suitable for outdoor activities such as camping. Also, you can take it to the bathroom or beach without worrying about water or sand.

[STRONG BLUETOOTH 5.0 SIGNAL]: SOWO wireless Bluetooth waterproof speaker can connect the device from 100 feet unobstructed even in difficult conditions and the signal is not disturbed. The Bluetooth 5.0 chip easily reads music playlists, and connects to any device such as smartphones, PCs, and laptops. It also supports the 3.5mm audio jack.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About surgeboom 2 SOWO portable wireless bluetooth speaker, a type of novel speakers with LED light and 360° sound and Bassboom Technology. Two high-end drivers and a pair of luminous bass radiators are built into the surgeboom 2, which improves the overall bass effect by 28% through sowo's bassboom technology. In addition, this wireless speaker also adopts full range adaptive dynamic power regulation technology brings lower dynamic distortion, more powerful low-frequency dynamic effect and 30% longer endurance working time. Bluetooth speaker built-in two luminous bass radiator, in low frequency will produce cool text luminous effect. TWS wireless technology is supported, and two surgebooms 2 are paired with a Bluetooth device to realize wireless stereo with double sound effect. True left and right stereo, 50W high power output can shock the whole space. What can you get with your buying? 1*Bluetooth speaker 1*TYPE-C charging line(Adapter Not Included) 1*hanging line 1*user manual

2inch 25W speaker - High-performance drivers and unique enhanced bass. BASSBOOM - Sowo’s proprietary Bass technology analyses the low frequencies in real-time and Perfect balance in clarity. Durable Fabric - Comfortable feel, and the durable fabric material and rugged rubber housing allows your speaker to outlast all of your adventures. Injection molding process - two kinds of green materials are integrated into injection molding to form an integrated framework, ensure the stability of sound quality, and improve durability and texture.

waterproof speaker SOWO's pursuit Sound experts at SOWO are renowned for their work in 3D audio, voice processing, and sound rendering. With many years of innovation and endeavor of a collective of sound engineers and design maestros, SOWO has been a leading manufacturer who develops the most cutting-edge solutions that optimize the audio quality of microphone, speakers and sound system products and strives to provide you with the best shopping experience.Let more people hear better music has always been our pursuit. 30 Day Returns 18 months of after-sales service 24 hours of service from SOWO after-sales team SURGEBOOM 2 Bluetooth speaker Surgeboom 2 looks as vivid and rich as it sounds. In order to produce superior sound and deep bass,because we use the better neodymium drivers; In order to make the bass more thumping, we design bassboom technolog；In order to make the appearance more beautiful, we use the two-color mold craft；In order to make the speaker more novel, we have embedded LED lights. DSP+Bluetooth V5.0 BASSBOOM technology IP67 dustproof and waterproof Cool LED lights 16H playtime Hands free call, 4ft range coverage AUX IN mode

Enhanced bass The blue tooth speaker with good bass. Two high-power drivers and two high-performance bass radiators will produce 25W high-quality sound in all directions. Even if you are 100ft away from it, you can still feel powerful and complete sound, and you can feel the radiation of bass under your feet. 16 hours playtime Built in high power capacity super electric vehicle battery, can be recharged more than 1000 times, and the maximum actual capacity will not be reduced. Compared with the 300 times rechargeable battery of ordinary speaker, the working life is 3 ~ 4 times，and has twice the voltage to provide stronger power. Let's Enjoy music day to night.(16H playtime at 50% volume） IP67 waterproof and dustproof Waterproof bluetooth speaker IP67 is better than IPX7, not only completely waterproof, but also dustproof. It can be used when bathing indoors and when swimming in an outdoor swimming pool or playing on the beach. If it sticks with sand, it can be washed. Bring your portable bluetooth speaker enjoy a showering, swimming, on the beach or even in the rain, bash on the anywhere.Note that before the speaker touches water, seal the sealing rubber strip of the charging port to avoid damage to the charging port.

Luminous speaker A pair of luminous bass radiators can emit 256 levels of brightness of the light ring, lovely, dynamic cool, for indoor and outdoor added more color. RGB light can provide two kinds of lighting mode, to provide you with more entertainment . Bluetooth speaker with lights is very suitable for gifts.LED can be adjusted by double-clicking the on/off button for light modes: fade mode, breathing mode, off/on light，and double-clicking to turn off it when LED is not needed. Built-in microphone After the iPhone or Android smartphone connects to the mobile speaker through Bluetooth, it can make hands-free calls, refuse to receive or call back. The effective distance can be up to 4ft, freeing hands to the maximum extent and realizing easy communication. You can also switch the call from the Bluetooth speaker to the mobile phone by long pressing the volume key to make a private call. Portable bluetooth speaker The product is portable and can be taken by hand or packed, which is convenient to carry out. The speaker is equipped with external hanging rope, which can be carried with you or placed on the bicycle frame. You can also enjoy your favorite music in leisure and travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid choice for classroom
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this speaker for over a year in my classroom.The bluetooth works great and it is louder than the last speaker I was using, which was a little cheaper, and not loud enough.It keeps the charge for a good amount of time and has been really easy. Very happy with the sound quality.As someone mentioned in the reviews, it does make a noise when you power it up and down, but it is a brief noise. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my better buys
reviews.reviewText: This unit is well worth the purchase. The tone (great Bass), volume and size are perfect for patio, home and most any other location. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality. Go for it! Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive sound, range and charge life
reviews.reviewText: This speaker surprised me in its sound quality and duration of charge, especially for the price, compared to other name brand portable Bluetooth speakers. For two days - easily twelve hours - I played and streamed music from my Android phone and did not hear a miss or skip. I moved my phone from room to room, even put it inside my car out in the garage, and the speaker never skipped or cut out.Volume range is very good and charge life excellent. The device boots up with a whooping sound that lets you know it's on and connected. About twenty (20) minutes before the charge depletes, the speaker makes a whap whap sound and the end lights flash warning of impending battery discharge. Plenty of time to disconnect and recharge the device.Instructions clear and succinct; connectivity quick and easy; charges in about an hour. Great value for the quality. Definitely recommend. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent sound for the price. I also have a slightly larger JBL and in comparison, the JBL sound quality is a little better but not much. Worth it for the price. The changing lights in the side are cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, not great
reviews.reviewText: My teen son kept taking my husbands portable Sonos speaker so we decided to get him a speaker of his own. He’s 14 and not what one would call careful with technology so we thought this would be a good starter speaker. It is a good speaker, and a really good value as priced. The sound quality is good and my son seems to like is a much as the Sonos and he’s taken good care of it so far. It also looks nice, not cheap. Our only issue is that the notification sounds are EXTREMELY loud and there doesn’t seem to be any way to adjust the volume of the notification beeps. The notifications sound automatically when the device turns on and when it pairs or unpairs with a device. I don’t recall if it sounds when the speaker turns off. It can be heard across the house and having a teenager who enjoys music at all hours of the day and night, it’s been quite annoying to be woken up in the middle of the night. I’m still hoping we can figure it out, but it’s been a month and a half so I think this just might be our new “quiet” for awhile lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time, nicely packaged. Took me a little time to configure all the settings, but that's because it's my first time using one of these types of speakers. Very good sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Real good sound for the size. Long battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great sound price was great was delivered quickly. 👍

This speaker is better then any Bluetooth speaker I have bought in the past . I was amazed that the lights on each end were also the bass speakers, so it actually has 4 speakers. For the size it has great sound. I took a chance and purchased two so I could pair them. With a simple push of a button they paired easily and stay paired even after they were turned off. Overall I'm very happy with these speakers.

For a small "budget" speaker it's alot louder than I expected. Turned on right out of the box and connected instantly.Don't expect miracles from this compared to namebrand but does more than expected. Great speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great little boombox for outdoor use.
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered this in April, when it was still cold in most parts of Canada, and it held up well so far. I've been keeping it outside in freezing temps, and the battery still lasts for at least a week on a charge, if not more. During the summer I only had to charge it once a month or so with a daily ~30 minutes of use (riding with kids to and fro daycare). I have it stashed in the Chariot, and occasionally forgot to close the tarp on it, leaving it out in the rain; still works well. It also had a bunch of squirrels go nuts at it, thinking it's some sort of snack box, but it held up well against them. Overall, if this would die on me in the next year or so, I'd still probably buy another.The sound quality is adequate. Sure, it can pump out loud music and it has some bass, but of course it will be nothing compared to a good car stereo or a hifi audio setup. Let's just place it somewhere between a built-in TV speaker and a mid-range, OOTB home audio setup. Which is good enough for an outdoor or kids party.

Purchased with a $20 coupon, so for $40This thing is amazing.Side base boosters are cool, LEDS, waterproof.Great sound. Decent base for it's size. Only peaks a little on very base-heavy songs at max volume.High and mid range are crystal clear, and honestly for it's size and price, can't complain about the base, it definitely punches above its size.And LOUD.Its a use anywhere speaker. Throw it in your aquarium and vibrate your fish.Super worth the $$$.
Good QualityCrispy sound and full range !
